events.message: I am submitting a claim after my car was involved in a collision last night on Main Street.
The claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' as the damage relates to a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle damage claim efficiently and promptly.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been acknowledged, and we have started the process.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driver's license for claim verification.
I have uploaded the requested documents including photos of my car accident and the official police report.
Our claims team has started investigating the details of the vehicle collision to determine the liability.
The investigation into your car accident claim is complete; the details confirm coverage eligibility.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the assessed damage and policy terms for your vehicle.
I reviewed the settlement offer and appreciate the quick response from the claims team.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following acceptance of the proposed settlement.
The payment for your approved vehicle damage claim has been processed and sent to your bank account.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful payment and resolution.
